question: Attention to all students that eligible to join the mock interview which will be starting next week, please read the schedule carefully.
answer: Any requests for reschedule or anything else will not be entertain unless it is important and cannot be amend and please do inform your PIC a week before the date. Again, please read the schedule carefully and the details about time, mock interview arrangements will be given through your graduate email. Please make sure that your graduate email can be accessed and if you get any issues regarding to the graduate email will not be entertain. Please solve it by yourself. We will only give the updates through official graduate UTM email.

question: Matematik susah? Masih belum cukup study? Peperiksaan akhir sudah dekat?
answer: Kami dari Persatuan Mahasiswa Islam akan mengadakan program "Study together With PMITUM" untuk membantu para pelajar mengatasi masalah-masalah tersebut. Ayuh sertai sekarang!! Butiran adalah seperti berikut: Tarikh: Isnin, 30 Januari 2023 Tempat: Dewan Al-Khawarizmi, Masjid Sultan Ismail Akan membincangkan kertas soalan peperiksaan tahun-tahun lepas Subjek yang bakal dibincangkan: Engineering Mathematics I, Engineering Mathematics II, Differential Equations. Untuk menyertai program ini, anda dikehendaki untuk mengisi google form di bawah: https://forms.gle/6CuGDw9W4XNUGbYy6
